rules_text:
When this Vehicle enters, search your library for up to two land cards, put one of them onto the battlefield tapped, and the other into your graveyard, then shuffle. You get {E}{E}.
When this Vehicle dies, you may pay any amount of {E}. When you do, return up to that many target land cards from your graveyard to your hand.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
